modName: I need to ask you to stop asking me to stop shouting
summary: If you\'re a Whirlwind Sprint addict, the guards like to walk up to you and ask you to stop. No longer!
descriptionHtml:
Can\'t say I\'ve heard of any laws against it, but I\'ll shout you apart if I have to.

If you\'re a Whirlwind Sprint addict, the guards like to walk up to you and ask you to stop. No longer!

This is something that seriously annoyed me.
author: peterfaj
